headline: Should You Reconsider HP Stock After Its 6% Rally and Market Volatility in 2025?
summary: If you are sitting on the fence about what to do with HP stock right now, you are not alone. The tech giant’s shares have been on a bit of a rollercoaster lately. In the last month, HP stock has climbed more than 6%, but if you zoom out, it is still down almost 22% over the past year. That has many investors wondering whether this is a bargain or if there is some hidden risk still holding the stock back. As we dig deeper, it is worth noting some resilience beneath the turbulence.
